description:
Three demons at Fuuraiji encounter a powerful monk.  Buddha puts a hand-print on a mountain.  Wives are tricked into shaving their heads.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Houraiji no Sanbiki no Oni / Tegatayama / Yome no Teihatsu
